TenantSecurityHealthCheckDetail.name: TenantSecurityHealthCheckDetail
TenantSecurityHealthCheckDetail.description: Stores the details of Health Check scores for a connected tenant. The Health Check detail page in Security Center displays scores and settings for all your tenants in one place. Use this object to get settings and risks per tenant on a selected date.

HealthCheckSettingIdentifier.description: The ID of the Health Check setting. This field is unique within your org.

HealthCheckTrendKey.description: The ID of the Health Check trend related to the Health Check detail records.

Name.description: The name of the tenant that was scored.

OrgValue.description: The org’s value for the security setting.

RiskType.description: The level of risk of the org’s security setting value.

Setting.description: The name of the security setting. For example, Minimum Password Length.

SettingGroup.description: The name of the security setting group in Setup that this setting is in. For example, Password Policies.

SettingRiskCategory.description: The level of risk of the org’s security settings.

StandardValue.description: The recommended standard value for the security setting.

Tenant.description: The ID of the tenant that was scored.
